name: Mobimento Mobile
tag_list: mobile-apps, applications, marketing, hotels, weddings, events, agenda, software, java, iphone, android, bada
overview:
Mobimento Mobile S.L. is being working in the mobile industry for many years, developing advanced software for mobile phones and offering consultancy services based on mobile technology. During these years, Mobimento has developed most of the mobile applications that main spanish mobile marketing companies have offered to their customers, and also important success cases related with mobility in the public sector.

The huge knowledge and experience acquired during these years, not only in the mobile software development, but also in creating a vaste variety of mobile solutions targeting different industries, have placed Mobimento into a leading position inside the mobile industry in Spain.

Mobimento uses its own technology, in-house developed, which is the most advanced one regarding both the development process and the quality assurance, guaranteing best results for its customers.

Mobimento has always put efforts in R&D, what allows Mobimento to be in the vanguard of mobile solutions and be always leaders in the always-evolving mobile industry.

Mobimento offers to its customers the most advanced mobile applications, turning mobile phones into powerful and interactive channels to communicate with potential customers, citizens, employees, etc.

Mobimento just launched to the market a brand new tool, called Mobincube, which smashes up with all barriers that companies find when trying to develop mobile applications, making easy to develop advanced mobile applications by people without any technical knowledge. Mobincube is a web based tool that allows anyone to easily edit the content, the look and feel and the life cycle in order to produce complex mobile applications. Just upload your pictures, edit texts, copy and paste, drag and drop â€¦ and Mobincube will do the rest, generating in seconds more than 60 different versions of the same mobile application, in order to fit it in almost all mobile devices in the market.

With Mobincube, the most advanced do-it-yourself tool for creating complex mobile applications, companies wonâ€™t have to invest large amounts of money for creating mobility departments:

â€¢ No need to hire experienced human resources. â€¢ No need to invest in acquisition of a bit number of mobile devices for testing purposes. â€¢ No need to know the huge range of mobile technologies.
